patthana14.13:1.1_0: Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:1.1_1: Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:1.1_2: Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:2.1_0: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:2.1_1: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:2.1_2: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:3.1_0: Āsavañca noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:3.1_1: Āsavañca noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:3.1_2: Āsavañca noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
